p: The RAAS derangement that is evident in many underlying chronic cardiovascular conditions, which normally do not affect paediatric populations, may be implicated in the severity of COVID-19 seen in older populations. It is becoming evident that while age is the strongest predictor of COVID-19-related death, in keeping with findings revealed by prior coronavirus epidemics, the presence of coexisting conditions—particularly chronic cardiovascular disease and obesity—are proving key prognostic determinants for COVID-19. 98, 99, 100, 101
